root: ^Camilla: I feel myself slipping away. Barely know who I am anymore.

StartChoices: ^You're still the Mermaid of the Night District to me.
What: ^Camilla: I can't really remember what I've done, who I've been, or what my life was. Who am I?

c-0: ^[[You were a performer, you were beloved..]

CantAnswer: ^Camilla: Well, then what am I supposed to do? I can't be nobody. I'm being erased by this virus. Is this it for me?

c-0: ^[[You were somebody, everyone else knows you.]

Mermaid: ^Camilla: Mermaid of the... what do you mean? Did they call me that? Because of the tail?
MermaidChoices: ^It was the name of your act.
^Well, you're a mermaid and this is the Night District.
Act: ^Camilla: My act? Like a performance? I was an actress?
ActChoices: ^Not an actress, you would dance and swim.
Night: ^Camilla: Okay, yeah, I guess that does make sense. Everything is just so confusing these days.
NightChoices: ^You had a very thrilling life, I can promise you that.
Swim: ^Camilla: I wish I could like, remember any of this. It all sounds so wonderful. But it feels as distant to me as a story I read once. I don't know, I don't know.
SwimChoices: ^Hopefully I can give you some relief.
Final: ^You finish painting the color on the cybernetic.
